name: ayrshire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of southwestern Scotland that was a county (= area with its own local government) until 1975: : Culzean Castle, Maybole, is in Ayrshire.
More examplesFewer examplesAs her soft brogue makes evident, Benedetti was born in Scotland, in the west coast county of Ayrshire. Dalmellington, when I knew it, was a traditional Ayrshire mining village, with friendly people.This flat, open section of the Ayrshire coast offers wonderful views across the sea to the Isle of Arran.The Ayrshire Cattle Society was founded in 1877.
